items.sentence: I hope it won\'t be long before I hear from Tom.
I hope you\'re not planning on doing that today.
Haven\'t we had enough of that nonsense already?
Tom asked Mary where she\'d bought her computer.
Tom walked into the kitchen holding a small box.
Tom wanted Mary to tell John about the accident.
Tom says he\'d be willing to loan us some money.
Tom says he\'s no longer interested in painting.
Tom says he\'s sorry that he caused you trouble.
There\'s something on that shelf that Tom wants.
